Hi! I’m Shivam Verma and I currently work as an Internet of Things researcher at the School of Computing, NUS.

I graduated from the Goa Campus of BITS Pilani with a Bachelors in Information Systems and prior to joining NUS, I worked as a Software Developer at Teewe in Bangalore, India.

Apart from anything tech related, I love traveling and reading. Though I don’t really do either of them as much as I would like to.

Hit me up if you need some (maybe useless) advice or someone to tag along with you on your next adventure.

Contact

You can drop me an email at first-name[dot]bitsgoa[at]gmail.com or tweet to me @vshivam.
